Quickstrike:





Quickstrike's eyes went wide as he saw the missiles heading straight towards 
him. He let out a squeal, and bolted. He scrambled on his feet, nearly 
loosing his balance. Having over-grown feet weren't helping in dodging 
things. The missiles went past him, one nearly hitting his back. They 
slammed into the wall, making a fair hole in the wall.

Quickstrike winced, staring at the Predacons. "Hey! No harm! Cut th' 
fireworks, tin-horns! Ah said there ain't no trouble here!"
